glosses: reciprocal of öpmek, to kiss each other, to make out (used with ile)

examples.translation: When I walked into the classroom you and Arda were kissing!

glosses: (of parts of objects) to kiss, to contact (used with ile)

examples.text: Parmaklıklı demir kapılar birbiriyle tam öpüşmemişti.
examples.translation: Barred metal doors hadn't fully came into contact with each other.

glosses: to make their cheeks touch on both sides, as a way of greeting

examples.text: Türkiye'de insanlar selamlaşırken yanaktan iki kez öpüşürler.
examples.translation: In Turkey, people kiss each other's cheeks twice while greeting.
